pr_title: KEYCLOAK-13369 Not possible to move groups in admin console

timeline.bodyText: This should be VERSION_2 serialization, since the structure of the message has changed and it is thus not possible to read version 1 messages anymore without an exception.
timeline.author: hmlnarik

replies.bodyText: @hmlnarik Updated, Thanks! Doublechecked cluster tests on my laptop and the scenario from KEYCLOAK-13369 ajd still works fine.
replies.author: mposolda
